Text:
Is it just me or is there some errors with the sound streams?
Background sounds that where left when they made the dub works alright but voices on both english and japanese version aren't working for me. Can hear a bit now and then but seem's larger part of the movie the voice volume is 5% of total volume or none at all...

can you confirm me if this torrent includes the dubbed, raw or the subbed movie? i downloaded a similar torrent of 1.4 gb but it came out to be RAW and i cannot find subtitles in english for it. I have no other choice but to download it again
Can someone seed me plz, need 5%..
